feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.115.1
entry.content:
Bugfixes and accidentally-missed additions for v0.115.0, including the ability to specifically block AI crawlers but let others through.

What's Changed

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Hide model library link if "show library" setting is off by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4417
  • Hide filtered tags on creator and collection lists when signed out by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4418
  • Remove accidentally-added debug code by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4419

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements ğŸ› ï¸

  • Add "nofollow" to various links to stop web crawlers trying to load them by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4415
  • Add option to exclude AI bots completely, site wide by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4416

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.115.0...v0.115.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.116.0
entry.content:
This is mainly a release driven by a bugfix around permissions on newly uploaded models, but also we've now got full API support for uploads, and support for Gerber and KiCad files for you open hardware folks out there!

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features âœ¨

  • Add API endpoints for creating new models, and adding new files into existing models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4424
  • Add indexing for Gerber and KiCad PCB design files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4432

ğŸ”’ Security ğŸ”’

  • Simplify upload API by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4428

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Fix indexable choice select box appearance by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4425
  • Fix file size upgrade job by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4426
  • Fix permissions given to new uploads by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4433
  • DIsplay access icons for all models for moderators and admins by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4434

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.115.1...v0.116.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.116.1
entry.content:
A very minor bugfix for an issue we spotted just after releasing the last version!

What's Changed

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Log error but continue if files aren't found during upgrade task by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4435

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.116.0...v0.116.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.116.2
entry.content:
A grab bag of minor bugfixes.

What's Changed

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Fix infinite recursion on collections by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4439
  • Update 3MF loader to fix materials bug by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4442

ğŸŒ Sustainability & Performance ğŸŒ

  • Add indexes on created and updated dates, for faster ordering in queries by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4441

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements ğŸ› ï¸

  • Show creator handle on welcome page if one was autocreated by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4440

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.116.1...v0.116.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.117.0
entry.content:
This release brings the ability to merge any models (sets of files) together into one folder!

You can:

  • choose an existing model as the primary,
  • create a completely new folder with all the contents,
  • or create a new model in a shared parent folder; this is particularly useful for those cases where you have what should be a model, but just has subfolders in it, no files, so Manyfold hasn't picked it up.

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features âœ¨

  • Merge any set of models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4456
  • Add options for creating new models when merging existing ones by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4461
  • Combine metadata when merging models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4462
  • Safely handle file conflicts during model merging by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4463

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Fix convert button on file page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4444
  • Ignore federated activities that attempt to update local objects by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4448
  • Don't allow editing or owning of remote objects by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4459
  • Don't show non-editable models in the bulk edit model list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4460
  • Prune orphaned problems on startup by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4464

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements ğŸ› ï¸

  • Slightly improve 404 and 500 error pages by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/4452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.116.2...v0.117.0
